people_also_ask.heading: As BioWare moved on to other games, it didn't look like Mass Effect would survive to see another all-new game. ... But to close out a full night of world premieres at The Game Awards, a new Mass Effect teaser rolled out and insisted that the series is not dead yet.10-Dec-2020
people_also_ask.title: Mass Effect insists it's not dead at The Game Awards

people_also_ask.heading: BioWare has announced that it is currently working on an unnamed, brand-new Mass Effect (which we'll henceforth refer to as Mass Effect 4). The upcoming RPG looks to be a direct sequel to both Mass Effect 3 and Mass Effect: Andromeda.01-Jul-2021

people_also_ask.heading: In the year 2148 CE the human race discovered the ruins of an ancient race known as the Protheans on Mars. After discovering these ruins, humanity learned the secrets of Mass Effect Physics and something called Element Zero, these two things combined gave humans the ability to discover faster than light travel.

knowledge_panel.description: mass effect is a science fiction media franchise created by casey hudson, drew karpyshyn and preston watamaniuk. the franchise depicts an alternate universe where humanity and several alien civilizations have colonized the milky way galaxy using technology seemingly left behind by an advanced precursor civilization. wikipedia
